vote.title: Authorize (1) an agreement with Eglington Development, Ltd., for contribution of funds in the amount of $120,000.00 towards the warranted traffic signal installation at the intersection of Forest Lane and Nuestra Drive in the City of Dallas; (2) the establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $120,000.00 in the Transportation Special Projects Fund; and (3) the receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $120,000.00 in the Transportation Special Projects Fund - Not to exceed $120,000.00 - Financing: Transportation Special Projects Fund (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
vote.description: Authorize (1) an agreement with Eglington Development, Ltd., for contribution of funds in the amount of $120,000.00 towards the warranted traffic signal installation at the intersection of Forest Lane and Nuestra Drive in the City of Dallas; (2) the establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $120,000.00 in the Transportation Special Projects Fund; and (3) the receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $120,000.00 in the Transportation Special Projects Fund - Not to exceed $120,000.00 - Financing: Transportation Special Projects Fund (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
